title: What are the quantum processes of the elementary particles that made up the universe? - Quora

response.answer_text: In the early stage of the universe, because of the huge energy density, fundamental forces are glued together —— Gravity, Electromagnetic force, strong nuclear force and weak nuclear force. Then along with the gradually cool down, the symmetry can’t hold anymore because of the cold temperature, so the fundamental forces breakout one by one, which then become the world we see as today.
